# autoreverses

**Instance Property**

Determines if the receiver plays in the reverse upon completion.

## Declaration

```swift
var autoreverses: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

When [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], the receiver plays backwards after playing forwards. Defaults to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

## Playback Modes

- **fillMode**: Determines if the receiver’s presentation is frozen or removed once its active duration has completed.
